Blaze noticed a strange taste to Silver Scouts Energeon. She transformed ba=
ck to bot and scooped up a sample from the red puddle which stained the flo=
or of the Black Fortress.. "I'm taking this to the lab to be anylized." she=
 said concerned that she'd been dumb enough to taste it without checking it=
 first. She turned away and rushed off toward the lab, finally satisfied th=
at she had a usefull role.

Bullet watched in awe as Blacknightmare carried=
 the mutants still body away. He hoped that Silver Scout was still function=
al. He wanted the pleasure of changeing that.

Shortly later Silver Scout f=
ound herself fighting to hold onto her memories. Slowly her thoughts escape=
d her. A blank slate soon awaited reprogramming. Only one thought remained =
in Silver Scouts origional programming, the memory of Veratis intentionally=
 giving her a virus that stole her sleek robot form from her.
  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2001 10:17 AM
  Subject: RE: Happanings at Bl=
ackFortress


  Blacknightmare::

  "No this time"replied Blacknighmare"A b=
ot like this alive is wortiest than died"

  Blacknightmare took the robot =
and dragged her towards cr where Blacknightmare left her. The Predacon clos=
ed cr's door and while the cr repaired the intruder the same cr, erased eve=
ry previuos memory and reprogramed the bot. Every memory, was downloaded to=
 Darkfate private files, where nobody over Darkfate could read them. 
    -=
---- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com

gs at BlackFortress


    OOC- Remember, it was me that mentioned something=
 about a bit of overkill.


    Blast after blast of energy struck the muta=
nt hawk. Her blood already
    stained the floor of the Black Fortress. Bla=
cknightmare was obviously a bot
    who didn't take chances. Either that or=
 the Predacon just loved to shoot her
    stungun. Silver Scout fainted out=
 of  consciousness, her vitals were slowing
    as she lay in a lump on the=
 floor. Shr had challenged her foe and lost. If
    she didn't recieve help=
 she'd soon die.

    Blaze and Bullet stood over the still bot stareing at=
 the bot. Bullet kicked
    it viciously to make sure it wasn't acting. "We=
 got it boss." he said
    turning to Blacknightmare.

    Blaze licked her=
 lips at the sight of the downed hawk, "Can we eat it?" she
    asked hopei=
ng for a good organic meal. The energeon rations that she'd been
    eating=
 were adaquate for survival but tasted like battery acid compared to a
    =
good organic meal. She transformed to tiger and started sniffing Silver
   =
 Scout. "She's still alive." she stated in disapointment. "Can I kill it?"
=
    she asked, as she took a lick of  the mutants energeon from the floor.
=
